refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns an appropriately localized display name for the input locale

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Object oriented style
static string Locale::getDisplayName stringlocale stringin_locale
Procedural style
string locale_get_display_name stringlocale stringin_locale
Returns an appropriately localized display name for the input locale. If is &null; then the default locale is used.

&reftitle.parameters;
locale
The locale to return a display name for.
in_locale
optional format locale

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Display name of the locale in the format appropriate for $in_locale.
